name: Fatima Kuinova
description: '''Panir Ibragimova''' (28 December 1926 – 28 December 2021), better known by the [[stage name]] '''Fatima Kuinova''' ({{langx|tg|Фатима Куэнова}}, {{langx|ru|Фатима Куэнова}}), was a [[Bukharian Jew]]ish [[Shashmakom]] singer. She was named "Merited Artist of the Soviet Union".
